video_prompt: Submerged woman's dark hair drifts, light-reflections ripple across her face as she exhales. White flowers undulate gently around her. Surface distortions hint at a changing environment above.
image_prompt: Digital painting of a young woman submerged in water, surrounded by white flowers. Realistic and dreamy style, visible brushstrokes like an oil painting. Woman off-center left, gentle expression, light reflections on face, dark hair flowing upwards. White camisole, pearl earring. Large cluster of white lilies to her left, more flowers in background. Deep green and brown underwater palette, light illuminating woman and flowers. Tranquil, ethereal beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Dark hair flows around a submerged figure. Light ripples dance across her exhaling face. White flowers gently undulate, swaying nearby. Above, the water's surface continuously distorts, hinting at environmental shifts.
